alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Inland Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 1:21PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Gulf, southwestern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida and west central Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 200 PM EDT/100 PM CDT/... At 120 PM EDT/1220 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of Blountstown, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orange, Marysville, Scotts Ferry, Estiffanulga, Abe Springs, Sharpstown, Frink, Kinard, Lewis, Hugh Creek, Chipola Park and Red Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
